officialTitle: Post-marketing Surveillance for Evaluation of AryoTrust Safety in Iranian HER2-positive Breast Cancer Patients Undergoing Adjuvant Chemotherapy Regimens
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Evaluation of safety by incidence, severity, seriousness and causality relationship of reported AEs
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with HER2-positive breast cancer undergoing adjuvant chemotherapy regimens

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who had received Trastuzumab as part of their therapy or were not candidates for treatment continuation after adjuvant chemotherapy
